message.body: Do you have shuffle board tonight? Or do you want to see reg's farm with me??
Oh man, I would love to, but I have to go back home tonight. Why are you going up to Regina's?
Air conditioner! I've been living without and absolutely dying the past few nights...
I bet. I just bought an industrial strength one for my house. It was more money than I wanted to spend, but well worth it. It can be a 100 degrees out an
d it will cool off my living room in ten minutes...but that sucks not having air.
Omg, I was going crazy last night. It was ugly. So tomorrow! I'm excited.
Yeah, I can't wait to see you guys.
It'll be even more fun when you buy me enough drinks to mimic a red#40 experience.
Ok good then I'll leave my wallet at home
I was just saying that to be nice. I really don't intend to buy you drinks silly.
Dont you owe me a few drinks?
